instructions.text: Say START to begin after putting on the VR headset.

In this test you will be shown lines for a very short time.

Before that, you will always be shown a circle. Focus on the center, if possible the point. The following is an example.
Lines can be horizontal or vertical. Many lines are straight, others are curved. Next you will see an example of a curved line.

Your task is to say which line is straight and which is curved.

After each line, say YES for straight and NO for curved.

Here is another example.

The test will now start.

If you don't see a line, wait for the next one.

text.question: Was the line straight?
text.end: The test is finished. Please remove the VR headset.

instructions.text:
In the following you will see more straight and curved lines. These will additionally be dotted differently.

Next you will see an example.

Your test will continue for multiple minutes.

Take a break and close your eyes for a moment.

More pauses will follow.

The test now continues.

Answer whether the lines were straight with YES or NO.
